properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Statement issued February 18 at 12:55AM EST until February 18 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Briefly higher lakeshore flooding is likely prior to
sunrise.

* WHERE...Monroe County.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Some additional water on low lying roads and
property.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty east to southeast wind in the 15 to
25 mph range is expected to briefly build waves and increase
water level from North Maumee Bay to Estral Beach. The wind is
expected to shift southwest prior to sunrise.
properties.instruction: Use caution near the shoreline and avoid water of unknown depth.
